attributes.action: Deliver the same level of responsiveness and support to those individuals who are part of small scale redundancy as those who face large scale redundancy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my town Motorola is in the process of closing down approximately 1100 jobs. These people will be given immediate training, help and support.   I am only 1 and can't get the same training, because 1100 people can shout louder than 1. It doesn't mean it is right. I have contacted job centre plus who now offer a self service and did not offer any training or funding. I contacted PACE, they refused to help because I am not part of a large scale redundancy. Most large scale redundancies are given government money to the tune of 2000 and told to get training. This isnt available to me as I am not part of large scale redundancy. I regularly ask if there is any more training available at the job centre but nothing more is available.
